name: Parlor! Pro
overview: Parlor! Pro is the first game of the series of the same name released for the Playstation console and is a gambling game that features 2 main gambling machines, one of the machines is based on Irem's Hammerin Harry character. Hammerin' Harry, known in Japan as Daiku no Gen-san, is a series of platforming video games developed and published by Irem in 1990. The titles were developed and published for the arcades, NES, Game Boy, Famicom and Sony PSP platforms. The game features also a sort of a story mode in which the player is a pachinko gambler and got a week to go around the different pachinko places and try to win a lot of money in the machines.
